items.name: Master Ball
items.text: Automatically catch the next Pokemon encountered.

items.name: Great Ball
items.text: Add +3 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Poke Ball
items.text: Add +1 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Red Card
items.text: Subtract -1 from any opponents next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Red Flute
items.text: Subtract -3 from any opponents next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Potion
items.text: Heal +3 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Max Potion
items.text: Heal +10 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Soda Water
items.text: Heal +5 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Revive
items.text: Revive one KO'ed Pokemon to half HP (Rounded Up).

items.name: Max Revive
items.text: Revive one KO'ed Pokemon to full HP.

items.name: Gold Nugget
items.text: Sell for $300.

items.name: Star Piece
items.text: Sell for $350

items.name: Scarf Band
items.text: Increase the Max HP of your active Pokemon by 3.

items.name: Leftovers
items.text: At the end of your turn, heal your active Pokemon by 1 HP.

items.name: Boxing Gloves
items.text: Increase the damage of your active Pokemon attacks by +1.

items.name: Winners Debt
items.text: The next trainer battle you win, your opponent must give you an extra $100.

items.name: Looker Ticket
items.text: Challenge any trainer to a battle.

items.name: Ultra Ball
items.text: Add +5 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Acro Bike
items.text: Your movement die is now a d8 going forward.

items.name: Flat Tire
items.text: Choose an opponent; their next movement die is a d4.

items.name: HM02: Fly
items.text: Fly to Safron City.

items.name: Weakness Policy
items.text: Your active pokemon has no weakness.
